Retirement.SelectAll: SELECT Name, EmployeeId, Department, Salary, JoiningDate FROM SysEmpAdd;
Retirement.SelectRetiringThisYear: SELECT Name, EmployeeId, Department, Salary, JoiningDate FROM SysEmpAdd WHERE DATEADD(YEAR, 29, JoiningDate) >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), 1, 1) AND DATEADD(YEAR, 29, JoiningDate) <= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), 12, 31) AND DATEADD(YEAR, 30, JoiningDate) > DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), 12, 31);
Retirement.SelectArchived: SELECT Name, EmployeeId, Department, Salary, JoiningDate FROM SysEmpAdd WHERE DATEADD(YEAR, 30, JoiningDate) <= GETDATE();
